title: LOSING LP FOR DC??????
body:
why the hell does riot make it that when you cant connect to a game you lose lp??????
I mean its pretty damn obvious that its not your fault for the DC...
Cant riot just add something that detect internet problems so you either do not get the punishment or at least do no t get a harsh one??????
I am pretty fed up with this mechanic, because i have lost three promos in a row because of it.
what im trying to say is, is there nothing riot can do to see that its not the players fault????? 
i mean i have pretty decent internet, but every so often (about once a month) i just randomly get disconnected from the internet and it just ruins games and i lose points. 


#GamerProblems

replies.body:
Unfortunately, there's no way for the server to determine why you disconnected, it simply sees that you've disconnected. In a basic sense, a disconnection looks the same regardless if you hit the *quit* button, unplugged your router or even lost power to your home.

I strongly recommend taking proactive measures to reduce these issues from happening. A great start would be working through our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to ensure all your local network settings are compatible with League.

Let me know if you have any questions.
